Class RxtxChannelOption<T>

java.lang.Object
io.netty.util.AbstractConstant<ChannelOption<T>>
io.netty.channel.ChannelOption<T>
io.netty.channel.rxtx.RxtxChannelOption<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constant<ChannelOption<T>>, Comparable<ChannelOption<T>>
@Deprecated public final class RxtxChannelOption<T> extends ChannelOption<T>
Deprecated.
this transport will be removed in the next major version.
Option for configuring a serial port connection
